channel.title: Novo Nordisk on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in Novo Nordisk on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: The GLP-1 Revolution: An Investor's Guide to the Trillion-Dollar Reshuffling
item.description: A deep-dive analysis into the GLP-1 drug phenomenon, exploring the pharma arms race, the expansion into new diseases like Alzheimer's, and the disruptive second-order effects on the food, medical device, and healthcare industries.
